description:
Time to improve the flow on your MSR TrailShot Microfilter? This replacement cartridge will make it flow like new.

  • Removes bacteria, protozoa, and particulate
  • 2000L filter life
  • Water quality will significantly affect the filter's life
  • Cleans with an easy shake
  • Do not allow the cartridge to freeze after initial use
  • Includes: replacement Trailshot cartridge, umbrella valve, check valve, pre-filter and a tube of silicone lubricant
name: MSR TrailShot Filter Replacement Cartridge
